name: SLAMMERJAMMER.exe
description:
SLAMMERJAMMER.exe is a 4 player "capture the ball" type mechanic with portal hopping, wonky jumps and stun attacks. You will need four controllers to play this game with your friends. 

This game was created during the 2018 Global Game Jam by the individuals listed below.. 

  • Adriano Valle: orcpunk.com 
  • Tim Kafalas:  timkaf.com
  • Mike Guiliano: mikeyacestudios.com/games
  • Paul Barbato: pauljamesbarbato.com
  • Enrico  Arcano: enricoarcaro.com
